title: Hand painted signage alphabet in Green Bay, WI
content:
![alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017121059im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/24449.jpg)   
Woo eee, my first post here. Here's an alphabet I put together from hand painted signage in and around my stomping grounds of Green Bay, WI. Thought you type nerds (like me) would enjoy this.   
   
Inspired by both a collection of lettering in Vegas I saw in Veer, and a trip down Route 66, I took last summer.   
   
I've got some more pix of the signs themselves over at [my photoblog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017121059/http:/www.bradknapp.com/blog).
author: bradknapp
